tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CivilEngineeringDesignDrawings (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    designer_name TEXT,
    drawing_file BYTEA NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE design_drawings (
    drawing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT REFERENCES infrastructure_projects(project_id),
    drawing_name TEXT,
    drawing_type TEXT,
    drawing_file BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE Project (project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
start_date DATE,
end_date DATE,
firm_id INT,
FOREIGN KEY (firm_id) REFERENCES Firm(firm_id));

CREATE TABLE Drawing (drawing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
drawing_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
description TEXT,
project_id INT,
FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Project(project_id));

CREATE TABLE DrawingRevision (revision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
revision_number INT NOT NULL,
revision_date DATE,
drawing_id INT,
ENGINEER_ID INT,
FOREIGN KEY (drawing_id) REFERENCES Drawing(drawing_id),
FOREIGN KEY (engineer_id) REFERENCES Engineer(engineer_id));
